div.p: School Closure until 5/21 with work @ home delivery method.
For more Information, Please Visit: Here

PRE-KINDERGARTEN ROUND-UP 2020-2021
If you are interested in Pre K or Kindergarten for your child please fill out the following form. More information about registration will follow . . .

div.h4: Revision of Class Rank Calculation Posted Date: 04/17/2020
div.p: On April 6, 2020, the Bosqueville ISD Board of Trustees approved a Resolution regarding Board Policy EIC(LOCAL), Class Rank. This resolution addresses the revision of how class rank will be . . .

Registration Information
2020-2021 SCHOOL YEAR TRANSFER INFORMATION: Please email completed packet to melissa.teal@bosquevilleisd.org or USPS mail: Bosqueville ISD Attn: Melissa Teal @ 7636 Rock . . .
The 2020-2021 Yearly Calendar is now under the Calendar tab at the top of the . . .
